name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary: As a Mobile App Developer with 8 years of experience, I specialize in building high-performance mobile applications utilizing **Google Flutter**, **Dart**, and **BLoC Architecture**. My proficiency encompasses mobile app design, state management, and implementing **Cubit** to ensure efficient and responsive user interfaces. I have a proven track record in developing engaging mobile applications while leveraging my strong communication skills in remote work settings. In addition to my mobile development expertise, I possess a solid foundation in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and full-stack technologies such as **React**, **Node.js**, and **FastAPI**. I have successfully led projects in healthcare and financial sectors that integrate AI/ML capabilities for advanced analytics while ensuring compliance with standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS.
